title: Font from House Beautiful mag
content:
Would anyone know this font?

Thanks,  
-w

| --- | --- |
| [Font Sample.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141112195624/http:/typophile.com/files/Font%20Sample_0.jpg) | 168.85 KB |
author: wendigil

comments.content: Yes, but probably not the Display cut. My guess is [Electra Roman](http://web.archive.org/web/20141112195624/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/linotype/electra_std_roman/?sample_text=They%20are.%20Actually%2C%20I%E2%80%99d).
Ha! I do believe you are correct. Thanks, guys :)
